description: Shingen Yashida (矢志田 信玄, Yashida Shingen), usually called Lord Shingen, is a fictional character, a supervillain in the Marvel Comics universe, a foe of Wolverine. The character was created by Chris Claremont and Frank Miller and first appeared in Wolverine (1st series) #1 (September, 1982).
name: Shingen Yashida
